name: dicom_hinfo
author: AFNI Developers
description: Prints selected information from one or more DICOM files to stdout.

inputs.description: Specify one or more DICOM tags to print, in the format aaaa,bbbb where aaaa and bbbb are hexadecimal digits.
inputs.name: DICOM Tag(s)

inputs.description: Use the specified string to separate fields instead of space.
inputs.name: Field Separator

inputs.description: Output the full entry if it is more than one word or contains white space.
inputs.name: Full Entry Flag

inputs.description: Omit the filename from the output.
inputs.name: No Name Flag

inputs.description: Place the filename last in the output instead of first.
inputs.name: Name Last Flag
